scripts.express-build: gulp copy-express-files && cd ../electron/express && npm install --production && npm prune --production && cd ../../express && npm run build
scripts.package-electron-windows: cd ../electron && npm install && npm run package-windows
scripts.create-windows-installer: npm install && npm run express-build && npm run package-electron-windows && gulp move-dlls-windows && node installers/windows/create-installer.js
